segments.text: Ms Willows , hello . This is Daniel calling from IBA Bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello , Daniel . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm calling to notify you that an Export L / C has arrived for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? Do you know which company it's from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's from Satura Beds of Tokyo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , great ! I'll send someone over to pick it up . Thanks for calling .
segments.speaker: S1
